text:
Always get a blank page after saving changes when editing a weblog page on the
demo site.

1. Login into Lenya's Weblog as editor.
2. Add a new entry or click on an existing one.
3. Choose File -> Edit with Forms.
4. Click on SAVE button (you don't need to make changes on the page).
5. Get a blank page.

I used Firefox PR (0.10.1) on Windows XP.

View source gives me:

<html><body></body></html>
creator: eric.jacob@bell.ca
gregor@apache.org
